# 知识共享协议使用常见问题解答非官方翻译项目

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhishi-gongxiang-xieyi-shiyong-changjian-wentijieda-feiguanfang-fanyi-xiangmu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhishi-gongxiang-xieyi-shiyong-changjian-wentijieda-feiguanfang-fanyi-xiangmu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhishi-gongxiang-xieyi-shiyong-changjian-wentijieda-feiguanfang-fanyi-xiangmu
zhishi-gongxiang-xieyi-shiyong-changjian-wentijieda-feiguanfang-fanyi-xiangmu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhishi-gongxiang-xieyi-shiyong-changjian-wentijieda-feiguanfang-fanyi-xiangmu
zhishi-gongxiang-xieyi-shiyong-changjian-wentijieda-feiguanfang-fanyi-xiangmu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
